name: Bloom (itch) (Dale Forward)
description:
This is my first full digital interactive book. It contains violence, drug references and a little swearing. It is a sci-fi story about a captain telling us how he learnt he was to become a captain. Use left and right arrows to go between pages and space bar when there is the special icon to interact with the page. Each page has a reading by the author so you can read along!

3D models by Synty Studios. Made in Unity.
